ext_descriptions.ext_description:
A Routed_cable_component_2d_shape_model is a type of . A Routed_cable_component_2d_shape_model is the two-dimensional shape of a . The shape of the cable in the assembly may differ from the shape of the cable in the usage view only in the details of the curve set geometry. The overall path length of any curve or segment shall not be different, and the direction of the curve or segment as it relates to the connector an end of the curve or segment is geometrically related to shall not change. These constraints are supported by using
which provide both location and direction information as the items related by the junction_placement attribute.

specifies a role of the
for the Routed_cable_component_2d_shape_model. There shall be exactly one
for the Routed_cable_component_2d_shape_model.

ext_description.p:
specifies the role of the
for the Routed_cable_component_2d_shape_model. There shall be one or more Detailed_geometric_model_element_relationships for the Routed_cable_component_2d_shape_model. The junction_placement specifies the set of relationships between
in the usage view shape and a corresponding
in the Routed_cable_component_2d_shape_model. These relationships establish the relationships between end points of segments of the curve set that represents the cable. These relationships establish the relationships between end point directions of segments of the curve set that represents the cable. There may be more than one
for the Routed_cable_component_2d_shape_model. The items related by
referenced by junction_placement shall only be . A junction_placement must be provided for each end point of each segment in the usage view that is desired to be related to a segment end point in the design view. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
ext_description.note: Since the items related are , there is no need for transformation matrix to transform from the source context into the target context.

A Sub_model_placement_2d is the placement of the shape of a
from a cable shape sub model in a usage view into the current design view as referenced by an instance of . The dimensionality of the Sub_model_placement_2d shall be the dimensionality of the current geometric context into which the shape is being placed. The dimensionality of the sub_model shall be the same as the dimensionality of the placement. The placement shall be in the geometric context of the design view.

specifies a role of the
for the . The sub_model is in the context of the usage view.

specifies either a role of the
that is in the design shape representation or a role of the
that is in the design shape representation for the .
